title: $2,800VERY LARGE ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT
posting_body: $2,800VERY LARGE ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT WITH VERY LARGE BATHROOM.
-HARDWOOD FLOOR WITH SUNNY ÁREA ON THE LIVING ROOM WITH VIEWS OF MISSION STREET.
- ONE VERY LARGE BEDROOM WITH GLASS WINDOWS AND CLOSET.
SPACIOUS BATHROOM WITH  BATH TUB , HOLDING BARS AND  STORAGE SHELVES.
- KITCHEN WITH WOODEN CABINETS, TABLE COUNTER
THAT FITS 4 HIGH CHAIRS,NEW GÁS STOVE AND OVEN, MICROWAVE AND DISH WASHER.
- LAUNGING ÁREA FOR DINNING AND ENTERTAINMENT WITH GÁS FIRE PLACE.
- LAUNDRY WITH CLOSE DOORS INSIDE THE APARTMENT .
- LARGE ELEVATOR , STAIR CASE AND HALL WAYS WITH SPACE FOR BIKES.
- MONITOT SYSTEM FOR VISITORS , ALARM SYSTEM.
- WATER SEWAGE AND GARBAGE ARE INCLUDE ON RENT.
LOCATED ON MISSION / 20th          - WALKING DISTANCE TO MUNI , BART AND PARKS ( Dolores Park ).
- SOURROUND BY A VARIOUS DIVERSE RESTAURANTS, STORES AND GYMS.
- TO VIEW BY APPOITMENT ONLY , EMAILL, CALL OR TEX  HERCY AT
